DOC.detailed_description: 21 caries-free ( CF ) individual clinical evidence caries experience [ decayed , miss fill teeth ( DMFT ) = 0 ] 21 caries-active ( CA ) individual ( DMFT ≥ 6 ) recruit clinical trial . The exclusion criterion : smoker former smoker , presence systemic disease could alter production composition saliva , treatment antibiotic , steroid medication know cause dry mouth last 3 month , presence dental prostheses orthodontic device . Subjects instruct brush teeth twice daily 3 min use Colgate® Sensitive Pro-Relief® toothpaste ( contain 8 % arginine 1450 ppm NaF ) 2 week . Volunteers ask refrain brush floss teeth , eating , drink anything water 12 h prior sample collection visit end phase . Supra- subgingival plaque ( 15 subject group ) , saliva ( 21 subject group ) , situ plaque sample ( 3 subject group ) collect treatment . Scraped plaque saliva sample immediately transfer dispersed sterile micro-centrifuge tube contain 1×phosphate-buffered saline ( PBS ) , store -80 °C need analysis . The situ plaque sample transfer 4 % paraformaldehyde , keep 4 °C 16 h , store 50 % ( v/v ) ethanol -20 °C .
